title_job: RAG & CI/CD Pipeline Expert for Azure
description:
I'm looking for a RAG/DevOps expert on a 1-month contract focused on setting up CI/CD pipelines on Azure.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement CI/CD pipelines in a cloud environment (specifically Azure).
- Ensure seamless automation of deployments.

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Proven experience in DevOps roles, specifically in setting up CI/CD pipelines.
- In-depth knowledge of Azure and its services.
- Familiarity with best practices in deployment automation.

Please provide examples of previous CI/CD pipelines you've set up on Azure in your application.
